frontmatter.title: What is the use of proptypes in ReactJS

nodes.excerpt: 'prop-types' is a run time typechecking of props. In order understand proptypes we need to know why and where it is used inside react application.  What is Props? It is special keyword in react, stands for properties.  It used to pass data as argument from one component to another. Uni directionalâ€¦
